Yeah...And? Improvised weapons exist. Are you saying we should be waiting for the fifth Darkin to be _The Darkin Barstool_ or something?

Considering that the Darkin were imprisoned in weapons, I'm pretty sure they were put into more formal weapons - Rhaast can be considered the only exception to this rule, as he was put into a reaping scythe (not a war-scythe), but, we could chalk that up to the Blade of Millenia being more magical to compensate for not being practical.

Swords, scythes, bows, maces, axes, spears - formal weapons like those make more sense than instruments.
